page.title: 12PENSCYNOR WILDLIFE PARK
page.content: In{1971}Penscynor Wildlife Park was opened by the television personality Johnny Morris. It is owned by Mr.& Mrs.Idris Hale. The number of animals has increased from{3 to 900}since {1971.}These animals range from domestic animals,such as rabbits and goats,to the more exotic,such as Cockatoos,Flamingoes,and Gibbons. There is an Alpine Slide,which was built in{1982,}since when a{children's {mini-Alpine Slide}has been added. There is also an{Adventure Playground} and a Pet's Corner for children. There is a baby Chimp called Suzi in Penscynor: her mother has deserted her,so now she is hand-reared by the staff. There is also an{Aquarium}in the Wildlife Park.
